name: Nested Dungeon (Ludum Dare 40)
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 40! Vote here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/nested-dungeon

Explore a military installation overrun by aliens in Nested Dungeon! Fire quickly at the swarm to avoid being eaten, but don't miss or you'll bring the ceiling down onto your head! Pick up guns, but beware: every gun you pick up is one more counter you have to manage to avoid overheating.

Coding: Ethan and Ian
Music: Ethan
Sprites: Ian
Controls:
WASD to move
Click to shoot
Tab to change weapons

Q to activate Bullet Time
Left Shift to slide

Space to jump
